description: Support to Justice for Peace and Development in Aceh

subproject.corporate outcome: Effective, responsive, accessible and fair justice systems promote the rule of law, including both formal and informal processes, with due consideration on the rights of the poor, women and vulnerable groups
subproject.description: - improve normative framework of laws, procedures and government to enhance access to and the administration of justice; - increase legal awareness and ability to access justice among the vulnerable, conflict-and tsunami-affected populations; - strengthen institutional capacity of the formal and informal justice systems to provide access to justice, uphold the rule of law, protect human rights and promote an integrated justice system; - increase capacity of civil society to monitor and advocate for the rights of the disadvantaged, to disseminate information to promote citizens's rights and to perform an oversight function of the justice system and act as a force for public accountability
subproject.gender code: Gender equality as a significant objective
subproject.title: Access to justice

subproject.corporate outcome: Strengthened capacities of national human rights institutions
